metadata.title: CVE-2025-26519 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: musl libc 0.9.13 through 1.2.5 before 1.2.6 has an out-of-bounds writevulnerability when an attacker can trigger iconv conversion of untrustedEUC-KR text to UTF-8.

criterions.comment: musl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
